viewData.name: Samsung NU8000 82" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart Multi-System LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung NU8000 82" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart Multi-System LED TV featuring Multi-System Compatible, 4K UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel Built-In Wi-Fi & Ethernet Connectivity. Review Samsung NU8000
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p across NTSC, PAL, and SECAM color systems with the Samsung NU8000 82" Class HDR UHD Smart Multi-System LED TV. This TV has an 82" LED-backlit LCD and incorporates Auto Motion Plus technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. It is compatible with the HDR10, HDR10+, and HLG HDR formats to provide a wider color gamut with compatible content and other equipment for vivid images.The NU8000 has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and internet-based content, plus content-sharing and screen-mirroring with other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Two USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
